name: sling baby carrier
description:
a simple and versatile baby carrier.  great for new-borns all the way up to toddlers.  use as front sling for babies (picture #1) and hip carrier (picture #2) as they grow.
-soft, sturdy materials
-machine washable
-simple to use

please send me your interior and exterior colour preferences.  i will email you colour options.  site will be updated soon with fabric options for online selection.

name: mei tai baby carrier
description:
a carrier style that has been long used in Asia.  sturdy and long lasting- use with new-borns up to 24 months.
Second picture shows it in use with a 22 lbs. baby.
-many different carrying positions including front, back and hip carrying
-carry your child from birth to toddler 
- suitable to 35 lbs
-one-size fits all.  can be used by mom/dad/care-giver
-compact and washable

straps come in black or navy.
please send me a note on what colour you would prefer for the centre panel.  i will send you image options (site will be updated with colour option images soon for online selection.)

name: tangle
description:
each unique, but balanced

sterling silver french hooks and chain
nylon coated wire
crimson japanese clay beads

name: after midnight
description:
this rope style necklace is one of my signature pieces.  the open form clasp adds extra versatility by making it possible to link any of the loops together.
wear it as a wrap, a standard strand, double strand, asymmetrical or any other way you can think of.

sterling silver oval loops
stainless steel rings
dark indigo reclaimed wooden cube beads (made in canada)
stainless steel open form clasp included
